Scope: General question about neutron/X-ray scattering
Category: Calculation
Q: I want to calculate the neutron absorption for my sample.
A: [ADDIE] Please go to website, https://addie.ornl.gov/helpsheet. Available properties to be calculated include,

• neutron absorption
• neutron resonance absorption
• neutron scattering strength
• X-ray scattering strength
• weight of pair contribution in the overall scattering
• Faber Ziman coefficient
• self scattering level
• plan my scattering measurements
• simulate Bragg diffraction patterns
• simulate instrument Bragg diffraction patterns
• simulate neutron total scattering patterns
• simulate X-ray total scattering patterns
• estimate how long I should measure my samples for Bragg diffraction or total scattering
• estimate the uncertainty level of the powder diffraction for my samples
